summary: The Personal Needs Allowance Modernization Act (H.R. 5685) proposes to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to increase the minimum monthly personal needs allowance for institutionalized individuals and couples under the Medicaid program. The bill, introduced in the House of Representatives on October 3, 2025, by Ms. Moore of Wisconsin and cosponsors, aims to update the financial resources available to these individuals, with initial increases effective January 1, 2026, and further adjustments tied to Social Security benefit increases.
